title: Operate a Straddle Carrier
description: A straddle carrier operator receives a job to move a container from under a quay crane to a yard stack.

tasks.description: Receive a work order on the in-cab terminal to pick up a container from a specific crane lane.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator's terminal displays the next job: pick up container WWWW1234567 from QC-01 lane.

tasks.description: Drive the straddle carrier over the container, lock onto it, and lift it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator successfully and safely lifts the container.

tasks.description: Drive to the assigned yard location and place the container in the stack, then confirm job completion on the terminal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The container is placed in the correct yard slot, and the operator marks the job as complete, making them available for the next job.
